oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1944-12-24 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1944-12-24, part 1. Personnel include Louie Buck (host), Beasley Smith (conductor), the Lion Orchestra (performer) including Harold Johnson (violin), Danny Ryan (performer), and the Carol Choir (performer). Also mentioned as being on the program but not present on this part are Betty and the Dixie Dons.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beasley Smith; Lion Orchestra; Danny Ryan; Carol Choir; Harold Johnson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra) -- Opening statement (Louie Buck) -- Santa Claus Is Coming To Town (Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra) -- Louie Buck introduces Danny Ryan -- I'll Be Home For Christmas (If Only In My Dreams) (Danny Ryan) -- Louie Buck introduces the Carol Choir -- Hark! The Herald Angels Sing (Carol Choir) -- Louie Buck introduces Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra -- March Of The Toys (Beasley Smith and the Lion Orchestra) -- Louie Buck introduces Harold Johnson -- O Come, All Ye Faithful (Harold Johnson violin)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Smith, Beasley; Lion Orchestra (Musical group); Ryan, Danny (Vocalist); Johnson, Harold (Musician); Beasley, Alcyone; Dixie Dons (Musical group)
